name: Aura (itch) (OnlineChungus)
description:
AURA invites you into a new experience where using light and colors is the key to progressing through puzzles. Explore and learn how color blending works in order to solve puzzles and progress thorugh the game.

The start and end screens are slightly slow at loading videos, so if there is a random black rectangle in the start and end screens, it's just trying to load the video.

Might have some issues in Safari

[This game was made as a project in the course TPD4168 - Game Design at NTNU.]

Made by: Bendik Nilsen Brunvoll, Lars Svensen, Henrik Kristiansen & Kristin Håberg
